00037 namespace {
00038   const uint32_t MINIMUM_READAHEAD_AMOUNT = 65536;
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 template <typename IndexT>
00043 CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead<IndexT>::CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead(CellStore *cellstore,
00044      IndexT *index, SerializedKey start_key, SerializedKey end_key, ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) :
00045   m_cellstore(cellstore), m_end_key(end_key), m_zcodec(0), m_fd(-1), m_offset(0),
00046   m_end_offset(0), m_check_for_range_end(false), m_eos(false), m_scan_ctx(scan_ctx) {
00047   int64_t start_offset;
00048 
00049   memset(&m_block, 0, sizeof(m_block));
00050   m_zcodec = m_cellstore->create_block_compression_codec();
00051 
00052   if (index) {
00053     IndexIteratorT iter, end_iter;
00054 
00055     iter = (start_key) ? index->lower_bound(start_key) : index->begin();
00056     if (iter == index->end()) {
00057       m_eos = true;
00058       return;
00059     }
00060 
00061     start_offset = iter.value();
00062 
00063     if (!end_key || (end_iter = index->upper_bound(end_key)) == index->end())
00064       m_end_offset = index->end_of_last_block();
00065     else {
00066       ++end_iter;
00067       if (end_iter == index->end())
00068         m_end_offset = index->end_of_last_block();
00069       else
00070         m_end_offset = end_iter.value();
00071     }
00072   }
00073   else {
00074     start_offset = 0;
00075     m_end_offset = cellstore->end_of_last_block();
00076   }
00077   m_offset = start_offset;
00078 
00079   uint32_t buf_size = cellstore->get_blocksize();
00080 
00081   if (buf_size < MINIMUM_READAHEAD_AMOUNT)
00082     buf_size = MINIMUM_READAHEAD_AMOUNT;
00083 
00084   try {
00085     m_fd = Global::dfs->open_buffered(cellstore->get_filename(), buf_size,
00086                                       2, start_offset, m_end_offset);
00087   }
00088   catch (Exception &e) {
00089     m_eos = true;
00090     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem opening cell store in "
00091                "readahead mode: %s", e.what());
00092   }
00093 
00094   if (!fetch_next_block_readahead()) {
00095     m_eos = true;
00096     return;
00097   }
00098 
00103   if (start_key) {
00104     while (m_cur_key < start_key) {
00105       m_cur_key.ptr = m_cur_value.ptr + m_cur_value.length();
00106       m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + m_cur_key.length();
00107       if (m_cur_key.ptr >= m_block.end) {
00108         if (!fetch_next_block_readahead()) {
00109           m_eos = true;
00110           return;
00111         }
00112       }
00113     }
00114   }
00115 
00119   if (end_key && m_cur_key >= end_key) {
00120     m_eos = true;
00121     return;
00122   }
00123 
00124 
00128   if (!m_key.load(m_cur_key))
00129     HT_ERROR("Problem parsing key!");
00130   else if (m_key.flag != FLAG_DELETE_ROW &&
00131            !m_scan_ctx->family_mask[m_key.column_family_code])
00132     forward();
00133 
00134 }

00137 template <typename IndexT>
00138 CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead<IndexT>::~CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead() {
00139   try {
00140     if (m_fd != -1)
00141       Global::dfs->close(m_fd, 0);
00142     delete [] m_block.base;
00143     delete m_zcodec;
00144   }
00145   catch (Exception &e) {
00146     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00147   }
00148   catch (...) {
00149     HT_ERRORF("Unknown exception caught in %s", HT_FUNC);
00150   }
00151 }

00155 template <typename IndexT>
00156 bool CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead<IndexT>::get(Key &key, ByteString &value) {
00157 
00158   if (m_eos)
00159     return false;
00160 
00161   key = m_key;
00162   value = m_cur_value;
00163 
00164   return true;
00165 }

00169 template <typename IndexT>
00170 void CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead<IndexT>::forward() {
00171 
00172   while (true) {
00173 
00174     if (m_eos)
00175       return;
00176 
00177 
00178     m_cur_key.ptr = m_cur_value.ptr + m_cur_value.length();
00179 
00180     if (m_cur_key.ptr >= m_block.end && !fetch_next_block_readahead())
00181       return;
00182 
00183     if (m_check_for_range_end && m_cur_key >= m_end_key) {
00184       m_eos = true;
00185       return;
00186     }
00187 
00188     m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + m_cur_key.length();
00189 
00193     if (!m_key.load(m_cur_key))
00194       HT_ERROR("Problem parsing key!");
00195     if (m_key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW
00196         || m_scan_ctx->family_mask[m_key.column_family_code])
00197       break;
00198   }
00199 }

00217 template <typename IndexT>
00218 bool CellStoreScannerIntervalReadahead<IndexT>::fetch_next_block_readahead() {
00219 
00220   // If we're at the end of the current block, deallocate and move to next
00221   if (m_block.base != 0 && m_cur_key.ptr >= m_block.end) {
00222     delete [] m_block.base;
00223     memset(&m_block, 0, sizeof(m_block));
00224   }
00225 
00226   if (m_offset >= m_end_offset)
00227     m_eos = true;
00228 
00229   if (m_block.base == 0 && !m_eos) {
00230     DynamicBuffer expand_buf(0);
00231     uint32_t len;
00232     uint32_t nread;
00233 
00234     m_block.offset = m_offset;
00235 
00237     try {
00238       BlockCompressionHeader header;
00239       DynamicBuffer input_buf( header.length() );
00240 
00241       nread = Global::dfs->read(m_fd, input_buf.base, header.length() );
00242       HT_EXPECT(nread == header.length(), Error::RANGESERVER_SHORT_CELLSTORE_READ);
00243 
00244       size_t remaining = nread;
00245 
00246       header.decode((const uint8_t **)&input_buf.ptr, &remaining);
00247 
00248       input_buf.grow( input_buf.fill() + header.get_data_zlength() );
00249       nread = Global::dfs->read(m_fd, input_buf.ptr,  header.get_data_zlength());
00250       HT_EXPECT(nread == header.get_data_zlength(), Error::RANGESERVER_SHORT_CELLSTORE_READ);
00251       input_buf.ptr +=  header.get_data_zlength();
00252 
00253       if (m_offset + (int64_t)input_buf.fill() >= m_end_offset && m_end_key)
00254         m_check_for_range_end = true;
00255       m_offset += input_buf.fill();
00256 
00257       m_zcodec->inflate(input_buf, expand_buf, header);
00258 
00259       if (!header.check_magic(CellStore::DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00260         HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC,
00261                  "Error inflating cell store block - magic string mismatch");
00262     }
00263     catch (Exception &e) {
00264       HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Error reading cell store ("
00265                    << m_cellstore->get_filename() <<") block: "
00266                    << e << HT_END;
00267       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00268     }
00269 
00271     size_t fill;
00272     m_block.base = expand_buf.release(&fill);
00273     len = fill;
00274 
00275     m_block.end = m_block.base + len;
00276     m_cur_key.ptr = m_block.base;
00277     m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + m_cur_key.length();
00278 
00279     return true;
00280   }
00281   return false;
00282 }
